about_the_game:
** Game will appear as Planked In Library **

** Game will still play as Lights Out: TPP Shooter **

LIGHTS OUT: TPP Shooter is a fast-paced third-person shooter packed with thrilling gameplay, vibrant visuals, and a dynamic soundtrack. Choose from 8 action-packed game modes, including Conquest, Capture the Flag, Team Deathmatch, Rush, Search and Destroy, Kill Confirmed, Free-for-All, and Insta-Frag. Play solo or with friends in multiplayer, level up, track your stats, and dominate the battlefield in this ultimate shooter experience!

  • TPP Shooter - Play single player, or online with friends.

  • Visuals & Music - Experience stunning visual effects and a reactive soundtrack that keeps the hype going.

  • Leveling & Stats - Track your performance and check your stats as you hone your skills and dominate the competition.

  • Insta-Frag Gamemodes - No room for mistakes—every shot counts in this intense, insta-kill game mode.

  • 8 Gamemodes - Whether you’re a strategist, a thrill-seeker, or a lone wolf, there’s a mode for you.

  • Killstreaks - Dominate the battlefield by unleashing powerful rewards as you rack up consecutive kills. Use your skills strategically to turn the tide of battle in your favor.

  • VOIP - Lobby voice chat

  • Built-In Gamepad Support

Lights Out: TPP Shooter - Release Date: 01-09-2025

Music Credit: Refresh - Aylex

name: LIGHTS OUT: TPP SHOOTER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600K / Ryzen 3 1300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580 / GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: LIGHTS OUT: TPP is a multiplayer third-person shooter, with hype visuals and soundtround. Play solo or with friends in multiplayer, level up, track your stats, and dominate the battlefield in this ultimate shooter experience!
